abstract: Sara Lee and Goldman Sachs, which is advising the consumer products giant on the auction of its household and personal care business, have prevented the Blackstone Group and Kohlberg Kravis Roberts from taking part, The New York Post reported citing unnamed sources.
snippet: Sara Lee and Goldman Sachs, which is advising the consumer products giant on the auction of its household and personal care business, have prevented the Blackstone Group and Kohlberg Kravis Roberts from taking part, The New York Post reported citi...
lead_paragraph: Ii appears that in Sara Lee‘s auction of its household and personal-care business, private equity firms need not apply.

headline.main: Sara Lee Auction Said to Snub Buyout Funds
